medicalTips.title: Medical Tips for Donors
medicalTips.tip1: Stay hydrated before and after donating blood.
medicalTips.tip3: Avoid donating on an empty stomach.
medicalTips.tip4: Wait at least 56 days between donations.
medicalTips.tip5: Avoid smoking or drinking alcohol before donating.
medicalTips.tip6: Get enough sleep the night before your donation.
medicalTips.tip7: Inform staff if you feel dizzy or lightheaded.
medicalTips.tip8: Wear clothing with sleeves that can be rolled up easily.

about.title: Fueling Hope, One Drop at a Time.
about.missionDesc: We're not just building a platform, we're building a lifeline. Our mission is to ensure that no life is lost due to blood shortage — ever.
about.visionDesc: We dream of a future where blood donation is a reflex, not a request. A future where help is a heartbeat away.
about.whyDonateDesc: One donation can save up to three lives. You may never meet them, but they'll never forget you.
about.joinDesc: Be the reason someone gets another sunrise. Join the movement — because heroes don’t wear capes, they donate blood.
